projects.name: Snoya – Custom Headless Shopify Storefront
descriptions: Snoya is a fully customizable, headless e-commerce application built with Remix, React, and TypeScript. It uses Shopify as the backend for customers product, cart, and checkout management, while the frontend is entirely custom and deployed independently (requires external hosting outside Shopify).
Integrated with Shopify’s classic customer account system. It supports email/password-based login, registration, and password recovery using Shopify’s legacy authentication system.

Most visual elements like homepage banners, section texts, and featured collections are dynamically configurable via Shopify Admin using metafields or custom fields, enabling content updates without code changes.
State management is handled with Zustand for optimistic immediate cart updates, styles are built with TailwindCSS and Shadcn UI components, and layout is fully responsive for both mobile and desktop.

projects.name: Medical Dispencer UI
descriptions: A lightweight user interface designed for a medical dispenser running on a single board computer. The project focuses on a clear and accessible layout with large touch-friendly controls. Optimized for low resource usage and reliable offline operation.

projects.name: Guided Tours – Admin Managed Tour Platform
descriptions: A full-stack web application powered by Node.js, React, and Prisma. It allows admins to create and manage guided tours through a powerful custom dashboard.
The platform offers a seamless customer experience on the frontend while handling backend operations like tour creation, updates, and user management efficiently.

projects.name: Econos – High-Performance Customer Web App
descriptions: A high-performance customer-facing web application built with Next.js and React, styled using Mantine and PostCSS for a modern and seamless user experience.
A fully responsive customer app with smooth CSS animations for an engaging user experience.

projects.name: VPS – Lightweight React App
descriptions: A Vite-powered React app using Mantine for UI components and styled with PostCSS and TypeScript for improved development experience.
Optimized for fast builds, it offers a modern and responsive interface with hooks from Mantine and smooth routing via React Router.

projects.name: Pixado – Fast Animated UI Showcase
descriptions: A fast and responsive Vite-powered React app using TypeScript, Bootstrap, and Framer Motion for smooth animations.

Pixado is a high-performance Vite-based React application, leveraging TypeScript for type safety, Bootstrap for styling, and Framer Motion for seamless animations. Designed for speed and responsiveness, it delivers a modern and dynamic user experience.

projects.name: Nova Lens – E-commerce Monorepo with Medusa
descriptions: A monorepo e-commerce application built with Medusa, Next.js, and TailwindCSS, featuring a customizable dashboard, storefront, and server, along with a wishlist plugin for enhanced user experience.
Powered by Turborepo for efficient development, it includes a wishlist plugin to enhance shopping experiences and streamline customer engagement.

projects.name: Vessa Hospital – Medical Services Portal
descriptions: A Next.js app with Google Maps, JWT authentication, email integration using Nodemailer, and a clean, responsive design using TailwindCSS.
Featuring Leaflet for interactive maps, React Time Picker for scheduling, and a smooth user experience enhanced by Swiper.

projects.name: Inventory Solutions – Full-Stack Inventory Dashboard
descriptions: A full-stack application with a Vite-powered React frontend using Mantine and TailwindCSS, and an Express backend with MongoDB.

featuring a Vite-based React frontend styled with Mantine and TailwindCSS. The backend is powered by Express and MongoDB, ensuring a scalable and efficient architecture for seamless user interactions.
The app can be accessed using 'admin' as both the username and password for authentication.

projects.name: Product Comparison – CSV-Based Affiliate Catalog
descriptions: A React-powered affiliate site that fetches products from CSV files and provides an intuitive product comparison experience.

Product Comparison is an affiliate website built with React and Bootstrap, designed to fetch product data from CSV files using PapaParse. It enables users to compare products efficiently, offering a seamless shopping experience with interactive filtering and sorting tools.
